mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pick_edu( pick_no, pick_user_no, pick_edu_no ) VALUES( SEQ_PICK_EDU_PICK_NO.nextval, ${picker.userNo}, ${eduNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT pick_no, pick_user_no, pick_edu_no FROM pick_edu WHERE pick_no = '${value}'

SELECT distinct * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT pe.pick_edu_no , a.academy_name , e.edu_name , e.edu_start_date , e.edu_end_date , e.edu_grade , e.edu_subject , e.edu_price FROM edu e, academy a, users u, pick_edu pe WHERE pe.pick_user_no = u.user_no AND pe.pick_user_no = #{searchUserNo} AND e.edu_academy_code = a.academy_code AND pe.pick_edu_no = e.edu_no ORDER BY edu_no ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT a.academy_name , e.edu_name , e.edu_end_date , e.edu_start_date , e.edu_grade , e.edu_subject , e.edu_price FROM edu e, academy a, users u, pick_edu pe WHERE pe.pick_user_no = u.user_no AND pe.pick_user_no = #{searchUserNo} AND e.edu_academy_code = a.academy_code AND pe.pick_edu_no = e.edu_no ORDER BY edu_no)
